data.author: Joshua Whitley
data.message:
Merge pull request #6 from kurcha01-arm/main

Fix 'No source or binary directory provided'

data.author: Kurtis Charnock
data.message:
Fix 'No source or binary directory provided'

Fixes #1.

Previously, building tvm_vendor with a CMake version greater than 3.13
caused an error:

```
CMake Warning:
  No source or binary directory provided.  Both will be assumed to be the
  same as the current working directory, but note that this warning will
  become a fatal error in future CMake releases.
```

This patch fixes it by adding a source directory to a CMake call that
missed it.

Issue-Id: SCM-1400
Signed-off-by: Kurtis Charnock <kurtis.charnock@arm.com>
Change-Id: I99865ad256bf9023edf25a16582afa6b86f5ab23

data.author: Joshua Whitley
data.message:
Merge pull request #5 from kurcha01-arm/main

Fix header inclusion, export without namespacing

data.author: Kurtis Charnock
data.message:
Export namespaceless headers

Exports the tvm, dmlc and dlpack headers without the 'tvm_vendor'
qualification so they can be included in the same way as they are
included within the tvm headers themselves.

Issue-Id: SCM-1400
Signed-off-by: Kurtis Charnock <kurtis.charnock@arm.com>
Change-Id: I572dbefba66bf0ca701738774cb56272942d5619

data.author: Kurtis Charnock
data.message:
Revert "Fix dlpack and tvm-runtime header inclusion"

This patch does not fulfill its intended purpose and is superceded by
another fix.

This reverts commit c053291ae2065f6b4374df299b780a99a6434782.

Issue-Id: SCM-1400
Change-Id: I7dd825af466e4406162c1c1de43fae8b9f26cb1b
Signed-off-by: Kurtis Charnock <kurtis.charnock@arm.com>

data.message: CI: Remove Dashing build

data.author: Kurtis Charnock
data.message:
Export library locations

Enables projects using the tvm_vendor target to find the libraries for
tvm and tvm_runtime.

Signed-off-by: Kurtis Charnock <kurtis.charnock@arm.com>
Issue-Id: SCM-1400
Change-Id: Ifc4fc8500010723414bf54877eb8ac9d58b0371a

data.author: Kurtis Charnock
data.message:
Fix dlpack and tvm-runtime header inclusion

Partial fix for issue #2. Previously, including these headers required
e.g.:

\#include <tvm_vendor/tvm_vendor/dlpack/dlpack.h>

But now we can use

\#include <tvm_vendor/dlpack/dlpack.h>

Signed-off-by: Kurtis Charnock <kurtis.charnock@arm.com>
Issue-Id: SCM-1400
Change-Id: I4e9868598bd4cc5e81f11bdc275fdd360adc0799
